Articles.Content:
I would REALLY REALLY appreciate even the most simplistic folder system so I could sort my craft in KSP in both the VAB/Spaceplane hangar and the launch pad/runway, having to scroll through an alphabetical list is fine a first, but it's impractical for those that like to have loads of very specialized craft

I personally feel there wouldn't be much code to it, it'd probably take an hour at most. This feature would REALLY polish up the craft selection a HUGE amount. I'm no pro though...

Thanks

BTW I LOVED the addition of the ability to add descriptions to my craft, allows me to remember all the acronyms I make up for each type of craft xD

Also though I'm aware it is very likely there is a mod for this but this is something i PERSONALLY feel should be in the vanilla :3

BTW a building entirely seperate for the design of rover to place onto ships as a 'single' structure would be really nice too :3

I highly approve of the first idea

On the second idea, my opinion is that there should be a type of symmetry mode in the VAB, and it should have been added by now. Or instead, there should be the ability to import other vessels from the SPH to add them to another vessel.

it makes rover building really.... odd... without this :/

The folder system would be the best thing since decouplers.

I agree to this. Folders would ve *very* useful. Right now I have them in the VAB/SPH and copy the wanted craft in the "main" folder, but therefore I have to switch to the Windows explorer all the time. I don't think thet it would be that difficult to implment.

Btw, can you see the description of a craft somewhere befroe you load it? Would be useful as well.
The description of craft can only be viewed once selected in the VAB or when choosing craft/crew directly from the launchpad
